values:
I just sold my car for $400.  It needed a new engine.  It's gone now.

In a few weeks i'll be leaving for England, right around the same date last year is when i got dumped.  So apparently October is my "big things happen" month, but hopefully England will not go into the "big things happen that suck hardcore" category.

I can't believe i still haven't moved on.

Science:265/300
Elementary:275/300
Social Studies:266/300

WEEEEEEEEEEeeeeeeeeeee!

One step closer to real life....

so the summer seems to be going by WAY too fast, yet at the same time each day sort of drags on.  I guess it's funny how that works sometimes.

it's getting to be about that time again where i just type and don't pay attention to what i'm typing.  i have some things i definately need to get out somewhere...hmmm...bottled up thoughts are never good things in my case.

WORK: 60-70 hours a week will mess with your head... in other news...
Lately i have been dying/highlighting a few people's hair with happy results.  (note to self: continue to look into going to cosmetology school once graduated).

I have been going to other stores to work and the GM's at 2 other stores want me to go work for them.  On top of that, I got 3 nice comments from Betsy who in the past has made me feel like crap every day i come to work.  So yay for me...i think that's saying something?

I'm considered one of the fast/good people at my second job (Target) and me and the other girl who's good talk all kinds of crap about the people we don't like.  for some reason, at 4-8am this is incredibly good times.

I need to go get a passport ASAP for my trip to England.  WOOOO...scared yet excited at the same time.  I definately need to do some "teacher clothes" shopping sometime soon.

RELATIONSHIPS:
boys will never cease to confuse the crap out of me.  no further comments on this at this time.

doing kinda crappy in the "friends" category.  I heard on the radio a few days ago that 1:4 people consider themselves friend-less.  That was kind of a sad statistic.  Maybe all those people without friends need to meet each other.  i feel as if i have a few close friends that i can (and do...those of you who are included in this category know this!!!!) tell anything to, so i guess that's better than having a lot of "so called friends" who never talk to you or are never there for you.




thanks to everyone who's been helping me get thru life the past couple months.  i realize how crazy/bitchy/whatever you want to call it i was for quite some time.  i think i'm starting to come out of that phase, so that's good news.


this entry wasn't nearly enough as honest/deep/insiteful as i had hoped to make it. i never was good at putting things into words...hmm.

anyway, hope everyone out there in computer land is doing well catching up on people's lives.  Hope this helps for anyone who was interested.

So i was going to type some deep, insightful entry about all the stuff that is going on in my life, when in all actuality all i feel like doing is going to sleep.  It's not like it matters what i write here because the people that actually read and/or comment are usually the people who i talk to in real life anyway.

So if you're that interested to know what's going on in my life that you want to sit here and read this entry, call me up.  we'll do lunch.
i don't know what took me so long to realize that i was never beautiful or amazing.  i was convenient.

and the people who say this are usually women who have just gotten out of a relationship.

another good sex and the city quote! :)
"If you're never anyone's girlfriend, you can never be their ex-girlfriend either"

Someone explain to me why i waste my weekends working for a boss that's trying to get me fired....fucking BITCH!!!!!

blah

Now to some, the concept of getting in the car and driving for no reason is slightly ridiculous.  To me, it meant i got to sing to myself, dance in my car, and just go.  It was actually quite relaxing and the sunshine was beautiful.  I got to think about life (don't you do this every weekend driving? you might ask?) well no.  I think it being light out helped me think and not simply focus on staying awake....anyway.  I just decided to drive and see what Michigan north of Mt Pleasant has to offer (which turns out, is not a lot).  But i did find a mini-golf place and a pretty nice state park.  

The point of this journal is to just say that today I enjoyed life.  

And it didn't matter that on my way back from my random drive i lost $76 at the Casino.  I saw it as a donation to the Indians.  They deserve it, right?  That and last time i was there I won $225...so i figure I owed them a little.

I also decided that I need to find out information about cosmetology school and have a goal/focus/direction in my life so i have something else to work for/look forward to now that school is almost done.  I will be here for only a few more months before going home for the summer never again to go to CMU:)  Student teaching should be a good experience, especially going to England, but once that's done it will be hard to find a job mid-year...so cosmetology school and substitute teaching?  hmmmm....

It's all possible.  And for once, i'm not scared to let my wall down, get my hopes up, and live life :)

You know what?  Life is good today!!!! haha.  why?  because i chose for it to be.  FUCK BEING DEPRESSED...I'M KICKING THAT SHIT TO THE CURB!  I will live my life happy and how i want to because i can....for at least a few days....

Yay for getting drunk the past 2 nights, lol.   I think signs of being an alcoholic are only being happy while drunk and the day after drinking, but that's ok.  If it's alcohol it takes, so be it, w/e....just hope my liver doesn't fail on me.

PS: The game Guitar Hero is completely ridiculous.

I heart myself...everyone else just isn't as cool

http://kevan.org/johari?name=marbear
the good...

http://kevan.org/nohari?name=marbear
with the bad...

Your Candy Heart Says "Cutie Pie"
You always seem to have a hot date, even though you never try to meet anyone. A total charmer, you have a natural appeal that keeps you in high demand. Your ideal Valentine's Day date: multiple dates with multiple people Your flirting style: 100% natural What turns you off: serious relationship talks Why you're hot: you're totally addicting
What Does Your Candy Heart Say?

never has a new meaning...never get over you. never be happy again.  never trust again.  never put my faith or hope into anything again.

i hate being hurt.  even more, i hate that you know it.

I want everyone to know that i am still in love with mark guest, because apparently i never let anyone know how much he actually meant to me.

"We are what we think"

therefore right now i'm thinking about how i'm going to rock the shit out of my test, 2 interviews, and 15 min. presentation on bullies that are all going on today.

*Crosses Fingers*

i believe in luck and karma.

As you can probably tell, I've been pretty down lately...so here's 3 reasons why i love the person who i am:

1. I'm not afraid to be honest with people.  I speak my mind, rather bluntly at times.
2. Although I'm afraid of change in life in general, I'm not afraid of changing my hair color!  
3. I can still be a little kid at heart and not be embarassed by the fact that my room is full of stuffed     animals:)

Yay for positive thinking!

i have become the fakest fuck i know.  i don't show real emotion.  i tell lies.  i do things intentionally to hurt people only so i can laugh about them later and how much it would suck to be them.

i am becoming the biggest bitch on the face of the planet, and you know why?  because i'm building a wall.  berlin can't top this shit.  if you don't let anyone in, then you can't get hurt. and you know what? i think that's the way i like it. 

fuck fake friends and people that only like you for who you pretend you are. i don't even know "who i am" anymore. i know that i like to act how people expect or the way people like.  but it's not gettting me anywhere. i've never been so empty feeling and depressed my whole life.

my feelings on life show in my hands.  they break out when i'm stressed, and my body even shakes at times.  my strep throat is awesome.  why?  because it makes my whole body hurt, which is excellent.  i love not eating.  throwing up blood was pretty cool.  most people would take this as a hint to maybe sleep a little more, learn to relax.  fuck that.  the word relax is not even in my vocabulary anymore.  i'll eliminate that one just like i did the word sleep.  it's not something i do well without crying before doing it or with the help of an alcohol-induced passout.

do not respond with messages such as "things will be ok" and other such inspirational messages.  that's all bullshit.  life is shit, and that's just how it is.  someone pass the goodamn t.p., eh?

fuck this entry. it's all bullshit anyway, just like my life.

I don't know which is more upsetting....the fact that you post cute comments on her myspace, or the fact that i bother to look

here's the deal: I still have feelings for you, am still in love with you even, still want you back, still put on my ring on occasion and imagine how it could've been.  obviously the fact that you're ready to date someone else hurts me, but avoiding me is worse yet.

instead of playing with my heart every time i talk to you, just be honest with me so i can work on getting over you, please?  because carving your name in my thigh every few days isn't exactly mentally stable.  Am i just the new Amanda, who i notice is talking to you again?

Here's a song that makes me cry every time i hear it....as well as scream it outloud when i'm alone and punch the steering wheel when driving.

Never give up.
Never forget those who have meant so much to you along the way.
Never let other people run your life for you.

never.

Checklist for self-destruction:

1. Brood. Allow your worst fears, past or present, to control you. Spend an hour or two thinking about all the emotional pain, disappointments, harassment, and failures until you are overcome completely.

2. Wallow in self-pity. You are the victim, the underdog, the unappreciated disgruntled employee, the neglected and abused wife, the misunderstood friend, the overlooked sibling, the forgotten parent. Blame everything and everyone else but yourself for your misery.

3. Stay in a state of inertia. Do nothing. Allow the forces in your life to control you. You are powerless against domineering individuals/situations. Without a say on your personal happiness, you simply let others dictate to you how you should live your life.

4. Pop a sleeping pill. Make it your best friend. By making it part of your regular regimen, your problems will temporarily fade away and not have the power to hurt you--for a short while.

5. Give in to your addictions and cravings. Don't do anything in moderation. Let drugs, alcohol, sugar, caffeine, fatty/junk food and carbohydrates rule your life.

6. Make time your enemy. Run against it, instead of with it. Stay out every night. Give yourself only three hours of sleep daily. Workaholism, all-night partying, all-day shopping are your feel-good therapies.

7. Do not exercise. Do not lift a finger and engage in any form of activity. That includes physical workouts, mental and spiritual pursuits. Do not go to the gym or walk in your neighborhood, read a book or meditate and pray.

8. Ban levity from your day. Smiles, humor or laughter are taboo. Let nothing amuse you. Be cranky. Let anger reign. Long faces are in. Snap at everyone within striking distance. Spare no one. Take no prisoners. Take your frustration out on your family, co-workers, and household help.

Inflate your smallest difficulty and turn it into a crisis. Magnify your issues and hold everyone hostage to your fears. Imagine the headache becoming a silent stroke, the palpitation a heart attack, the benign cyst a malignant tumor. Announce to the world that you are sick and use it as an excuse to withdraw from life.

9. Do not give thanks. Thanksgiving is alien to you. All the goodness and blessings that you have received and continue to receive should not be given any value. You believe that it is God's obligation to you and you are entitled to whatever you get.

10. Do not love. Hang a "do not enter" sign on the door of your heart. Keep it closed and unfeeling, and pretend to the rest of the world that you can live without it. Sacrifice your happiness to your ambitions.

We were laying in my room but instead of my bunk beds there was nothing but the big couch from my living room which also serves as a pull out bed.

Laying there cuddling and rubbing noses together, you told me you still love me and that she's just there for  you right now, that she's not even pretty and you don't even have feelings for her.

Yet, when she walks in the room, you call me a bitch for trying to get you to lay with me, and kiss her on the mouth with passion.

As i start to cry, something i've gotten good at over the past 3 months, i also hear a ringing in my ears that won't go away, and i crazily search for the noise, which luckily for me, was my real alarm clock to wake me up this morning and end this.  And like that, the dream was over; so why is it replaying over and over in my head?

I am finally accepting that you don't want me back.  

And one day that will be ok with me.  Yesterday was not that day, and today is not either.

I was informed today about the opportunity to student teach in England as part of my student teaching experience.  I'm in the "thinking it out loud" stage as i like to call it.  I've always wanted to go to Europe, and it would look great on a resume.  Yet, it's expensive, i'd be lonely, and it might be scary.

So i'm taking a survey.  Knowing me, do you think i could do it?

Results so far:
13 Yay!  :)
0 Nay :(

My car got backed into for the 2nd time....while legally parked!!!

HELLO>>> what do you think your rearview mirror is for?!!

People suck.

Your Power Color Is Gold
At Your Highest: You are engrossed in passions that mentally stimulate you. At Your Lowest: You seek thrills and neglect what's important in your life. I think the best thing in the world is pajama parties with drinking games and sweedish fish.  Minus the alcohol, i felt like a 12 year old and it was the greatest thing in the world right now.

Matt Nawrocki is my hero.

So yeah...still don't know what to put in here.  The excitement that is my life...hmm...non-existant!

School is going ok, but i hate group projects with a passion!!!  History 101 is boring as fuck and the train reck that is her lectures both annoys me and pisses me off.

I've been really down/depressed/bitchy lately and that also makes me angry.  I feel as if i have no energy or desire to do anything, hence the getting behind on shit i have to do, not eating well, and not sleeping well. :(

Other than all that bitchy crap...Thursday was fun at Grand Valley visiting Jamie :)  yay for clubbing and craziness.  It was nice to talk to a real friend and spend some quality time with my Jamie, even if she is sad...:(  

And I just ended two paragraph type things with sad faces, so now a happy face type thing...What should I be for Halloween?  And who would come if we had a party at our apt. here in mt. p?  it'd be the thurs before halloween (the 27th) :)

Pure Nerd
52 % Nerd, 8% Geek, 34% Dork
For The Record:

A Nerd is someone who is passionate about learning/being smart/academia.
A Geek is someone who is passionate about some particular area or subject, often an obscure or difficult one.
A Dork is someone who has difficulty with common social expectations/interactions.
You scored better than half in Nerd, earning you the title of: Pure Nerd.

The times, they are a-changing. It used to be that being exceptionally smart led to being unpopular, which would ultimately lead to picking up all of the traits and tendences associated with the "dork." No-longer. Being smart isn't as socially crippling as it once was, and even more so as you get older: eventually being a Pure Nerd will likely be replaced with the following label: Purely Successful.

Congratulations!


Also, you might want to check out some of my other tests if you're interested in any of the following:

Buffy the Vampire Slayer

Professional Wrestling

Love & Sexuality

America/Politics

1. Reply with your name and I will write something I like about you.
2. I will then tell what song reminds me of you.
3. If I were to apply an o'clock to you, I'll tell you what it would be.
4. I will try to name a single word that best describes you.
5. I'll tell you the most memorable moment I've had with you.
6. I will tell you what color you remind me of.
7. I'll then tell you something that I've always wondered about you.
8. Put this in your journal.

oh, and hey...anyone who wants to go to cedar point on friday is more than welcome to join us!  it's a group of people from wendy's, so i didn't really invite other peeps cuz mostly you wouldn't know anyone...well besides me, and i'm cool...so, uh, come!

I sent people invites using facebook, but it messed up the date and time in the invites (i think), so i'll post it here as well...trying to get the word out!

May 27th= my birthday
party at dodge park from 1-8...you know you want to come!

Bring a friend, or maybe your mom (HA!)

Hey all, just got back from LeaderShape camp on sunday.  My phone didn't work there.  As it turns out, my charger is still in Mt. Pleasant, so if anyone needs to get ahold of me, call my house phone!

(586) 939-8236

Yay!  oh yeah, and leave a message with your phone number cuz i have nobody's number's either for awhile!

Blah!  I feel like an overly dramatic emo kid...hmm.

So it seems like everyone is in the "I have no friends boat" right along with me.  It made me realize that it's not that we don't have friends, just don't have the time like we had in the past to see those friends.  Over the summer, I propose a BBQ of sorts at Dodge Park, maybe get one of those big sub things?  I dunno, but whatever it is, you're all invited!!!! 

Based on the fact that not many people made it to the jello fight last year, I'm thinking about doing this instead on July 31st?  It's the annual day of the jello fight=easy to remember :)  Hopefully more people will be able to go/want to go since there's no sticky mess.  And maybe i'll bring some jello there anyway and then we can all play volleyball in the sand, cuz let's face it, it's just a good idea!  (sarcasm, sarcasm, sarcasm).

Anyone have any other fun ideas for big group outings?  My mom's not really into having a bunch of people in my house (and there's nowhere to put them anyway).

Please just comment something if you read this.  I've been really stressed and upset lately and feel like i have no friends.  I realize this is a sad and pathetic journal entry, but it corresponds to how i've been feeling...

car accident...blah...

hit one of those big huge metal guard rail things with the front right side of my bumper.  Lost control of the car on some rumble strips which made my car spin around a few times, started heading straight for the thing, felt like i was about to die, somehow just barely knicked it, breaking my headlight and denting the right side fender.  How it hit the right side and nothing on the left, i don't know, i'm just glad that the brakes (and the grass in the wheels probably) stopped me in time to not continue moving heading into oncoming traffic!


So, uh...other than that, just glad to be alive!
Sick of making a living, not a life....

yesterday was quite possibly ONE of the worst days of my life...

i'm so sick of crying myself to sleep!

i just want to go outside in the middle of nowhere, and just start screamming fuck, ass, shit, piss, and all the other bad words at the top of my lungs.  


I apologize in advance for being a huge bitch to anyone i talk to in the next few days.  At least my test today went well, can't wait for the 2 i have on thursday! (Thumbs down).


I really just need to get away from home and Mt. Pleasant soon.  I can't wait to go visit Jamie at Grand Valley next week!  I don't even care what we do, we could just sit there and stare at the wall for all i care...i MISS MY REAL FRIENDS!!!!

So my car pretty much sucks, so i'm getting rid of it.  I'm thinking about getting a mitsubishi eclipse, but some people say it's too "conformist"...other thoughts are a toyota celica or a honda accord coupe or insight.  My sister works for GM and i can can get a discount because of that, but i really just don't most of the cars they're making.  Maybe the Cobalt?

Blah, here's to spending more money!  YAY!  not.  But it will be nice to have a car that actually works that doesn't just randomly break down, piss you off, and cause you to miss class.

On a better note, only a few more weeks of class.  Good deal cuz i just don't feel like going anymore.  Summer will be boring, just working....maybe i'll get a second job, cuz i think we all know i really wouldn't know what to do if i actually had FREE TIME over the summer?!?!

Thinking about dying my hair again, just can't decide on what color this time...any suggestions?
